content: For our PD-1 CTLA-4 bispecific, vudalimab, will also present some early data from the first of our two Phase II studies, the chemotherapy combination in patients with metastatic castrate-resistant prostate cancer and our second Phase II study in patients with clinically defined high-risk metastatic castrate-resistant prostate cancer and certain gynecological malignancies is now dosing patients.
